content: TE-C CB Brick channel chisels Extra-sharp SDS Plus (TE-C) brick channel chisels for gouging channels in masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Specially designed, high-performance brick channel chisel – sharpened edges for gouging channels in grout-filled block Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Better reliability – these channel chisels are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Built for tough jobs – tested for extreme use, our chisels are made to power through your most demanding channel chasing work Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Applications Creating channels in (hollow) brick walls for recessed conduits For use with SDS Plus (TE-C) electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-C (SDS Plus) Application: Channeling Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Connection end | TE-C (SDS Plus) | Application | Channeling | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2429005 - Brick channel chisel TE-C CB 25/2 - Package Size 1 pc
